transArray.content: The hotel facilities are very clean, the front desk service is very good, the rooms are warm and comfortable, and a robot will deliver takeaways upstairs. The price is right. Overall, I am very satisfied. Highly recommended!

Dear guest, thank you very much for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your stay experience. Summer has a late glow. Just like you who come late, everyone is smiling. I love you, little man.
